channel.title: Mariska Hargitay on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Mariska Hargitay on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘My Mom Jayne’ Review: Mariska Hargitay’s Fascinating Portrait of the Famous Mother She Barely Knew
item.description: The ‘Law & Order: SVU’ actor’s doc delves into the career frustrations and offscreen complexities of her movie-star mother, Jayne Mansfield, and reveals long-held family secrets.

item.title: ‘My Mom Jayne’ Review: Mariska Hargitay’s Fascinating Portrait of the Famous Mother She Barely Knew

item.title: Reneé Rapp Says She Wants to Play Mariska Hargitay’s “Lover” on ‘Law & Order: SVU’
item.description: The actress-singer said Hargitay‘s character, Captain Olivia Benson, “would be gay, finally.”
